content.query:
-- Read Payment_Type.json
-- Connect to Built in Serverless SQL Pool
-- Connect to nyc_taxi_discovery Database

USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

--Using JSON_VALUE

SELECT * 
, CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type
, CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc
FROM OPENROWSET(
BULK 'payment_type.json' ,
DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw' ,
FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', -- Vertical Tab
FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- Vertical Tab
ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a' -- Hex Value of \n
)WITH(  
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type
